name: Hard Lick Sports iFootball: "Mud, Muscles, & Mayhem"
blurb: Completing an exciting new "11 vs 11" football simulation for high-end iOS & Android mobile devices focused on hard-hitting contact.

rewards.reward: Exclusive "backers-only" "Mud, Muscles & Mayhem" iFOOTBALL WALLPAPERS & DIGITAL PRODUCTION ART, "backers-only" email updates and progress reports on development schedule, and of course...our sincere thanks!

Exclusive wallpapers & production art listed above, plus...HARD LICK SPORTS (HLS) "STRESS-RELIEVEING" FOOTBALL on a KEYCHAIN, listing in the credits as a "SEASON TICKET HOLDER", see your name appear on the stadium lower wall video display panel during game play, and receive exclusive email updates and progress reports on development schedule.\r\n\r\nInternational supporters, please add $10.00 (US) to help cover additional cost of shipping your reward.

YOUR CHOICE of a top quality HARD LICK SPORTS LOGO TEE-SHIRT (Hanes Beefy-T) OR HARD LICK SPORTS HAT, your name listed as "TEAM ASSOCIATE" in the credits, have your name & picture appear in the Fan-cam "Faces in the Crowd" feature of the stadium lower wall video display panel during game play. Also receive invitations to keep abreast of  development progress via browser-version testing, with "backers-only" email updates and progress reports on development schedule.International supporters, please add $10.00 (US) to help cover additional cost of shipping your reward.

YOUR NAME, PICTURE & CREDITS LEVEL DESIGNATION displayed in the Fan-cam "Faces in the Crowd" feature as seen on the video display panels located on the field-level stadium walls during game-play, your choice of a top quality Hard Lick Sports logo tee-shirt (Hanes Beefy-T) or hat, your name listed as 'ASSISTANT COACH" in the credits.  Also receive invitations to keep abreast of  development progress via browser-version testing, with "backers-only" email updates and progress reports on development schedule.International supporters, please add $10.00 (US) (US) to help cover additional cost of shipping your reward.

Get a Hard Lick Sports REPLICA FOOTBALL WITH IN-GAME TEAM LOGO of one of our HLS in-game teams, your choice of a top quality Hard Lick Sports logo tee-shirt (Hanes Beefy-T) or hat.  Listing in the credits as "DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATE".   Your name, picture, and credit level displayed in the Fan-cam "Faces in the Crowd" feature as seen on the video display panels located on the field-level stadium walls during game-play.  Also receive invitations to keep abreast of  development progress via browser-version testing,  "backers-only" updates and progress reports on development schedule.International supporters, please add $10.00 (US) (US) to help cover additional cost of shipping your reward.

Get a LIMITED-EDITION AUTOGRAPHED Hard Lick Sports FOOTBALL JERSEY WITH IN-GAME TEAM LOGO SIGNED BY the HLS DEVELOPMENT TEAM, choice of HLS tee-shirt or hat, plus have your name & picture shown as a "DESIGN CONSULTANT" in the credits & displayed on the video display panels located on the field-level stadium walls during game-play, receive invitations to keep abreast of game progress via browser-version testing, plus participation in select design team online conferences to provide input and vote on features you would like to see added.  Also receive "backers-only" email updates and progress reports on development schedule.International supporters, please add $10.00 (US) (US) to help cover additional cost of shipping your reward.

LIMITED-EDITION AUTOGRAPHED REGULATION-SIZE FOOTBALL with Hard Lick Sports & team logo (your choice) SIGNED BY HLS DEV TEAM, HLS tee-shirt & hat, plus have your name & picture shown as "ASSOCIATE PRODUCER" in the credits & displayed on the video display panels located on the field-level stadium walls during game-play, receive invitations to keep abreast of game progress via browser-version testing, plus participation in select design team online conferences to provide input and vote on features you would like to see added.  Also receive "backers-only" email updates and progress reports on development schedule.International supporters, please add $10.00 (US) (US) to help cover additional cost of shipping your reward.

LIMITED-EDITION AUTOGRAPHED REGULATION-SIZE FOOTBALL HELMET with Hard Lick Sports & team logo (your choice) SIGNED BY THE HARD LICK SPORTS DEV TEAM, HLS tee-shirt & hat, have your name & picture shown with your title as "EXECUTIVE PRODUCER" in the credits displayed on the video display panels located on the field-level stadium walls during game-play, receive invitations to keep abreast of game progress via browser-version testing, plus participation in select design team online conferences to provide input and vote on features you would like to see added.  Also receive "backers-only" email updates and progress reports on development schedule.International supporters, please add $10.00 (US) (US) to help cover additional cost of shipping your reward.

PRIVATE IN-GAME VIRTUAL "VIP SKY BOX" WITHIN STADIUM OF YOUR CHOICE from which you may choose to send in the plays and watch your team in action, a HLS tee-shirt & hat, plus have your name & picture shown with your title as "GENERAL MANAGER" in the credits, displayed on the video display panels located on the field-level stadium walls during game-play, receive invitations to keep abreast of game progress via browser-version testing, plus participation in select design team online conferences to provide input and vote on features you would like to see added.  Also receive "backers-only" email updates and progress reports on development schedule.  International supporters, please add $10.00 (US) (US) to help cover additional cost of shipping your reward.

NAMING PRIVILEGES FOR ONE of the twelve (12) UNIQUE IN-GAME STADIUMS. (Priority will be decided based on earliest date of pledge). Designation as a  "LEAGUE COMMISSIONER" in the credits & displayed with your name & picture on the video display panels located on the field-level stadium walls during game-play, a "Hard Lick Coach" jacket, receive invitations to keep abreast of game progress via browser-version testing, plus participation in select design team online conferences to provide input and vote on features you would like to see added.  Also receive "backers-only" email updates and progress reports on development schedule.  International supporters, please add $10.00 (US) (US) to help cover additional cost of shipping your reward.

INVITATION TO AN EXCLUSIVE PRIVATE "LAUNCH" PARTY hosted by Tony Simpson, Doug Johnson and key members of the Hard Lick Sports development team, INCLUDING APPROVED AIR TRAVEL (within USA) and TWO (2) NIGHTS HOTEL STAY in beautiful San Diego California. Designation as a member of the "OWNERS' COUNCIL" in the credits and displayed with your name & picture on the video display panels located on the field-level stadium walls during game-play, a "Hard Lick Coach" jacket, receive invitations to keep abreast of game progress via browser-version testing, plus participation in select design team online conferences to provide input and vote on features you would like to see added. Also receive "backers-only" email updates and progress reports on development schedule.
